column5: Hey guys, Summer now being done for me and the kids, i thought i would post our photos from fishing at the Cottage we rented back in July.   This is where we stayed, awesome place!   Thea fishing    Cole Fishing   Coles's big bass, he didn't want it to bite him     One of my many off the dock bass.    One of the american guys up fishing, who graciously invited me out with him   Another of Cole's bass. Caught on the Rocket fishing rod. Pretty Cool toy!     My daughter Thea and one of her big bass.      My buddy Carl with his bass and beer at 7:30 am!    First nite off the dock with worm and bobbers!    Probably one of the best weeks spent with my family and kids! The week before the weather was very hot and being in the hvac trade it was busy so the week off couldn't have come at a better time! Great weather and great friends!
Thanks! this place was Fantastic! highly recomend it!
Where abouts is this placE? Nice report, looked like the kiddies had a great time.
Its just outside ottawa in Arnprior on White Lake

great pics. I was up there 3 weeks ago with my bro. will be there again this saturday.He usually fishes the south end, but this time i'm bringing my boat too.not as fast as his B Boat, since we are going in at White Lake marina, i'm gonna fish the north end. It's a beautifull area for sure and fishin is good.
Very nice report and pictures.  Beautiful kids you have there.  Hmmm, beer at 7:30, sounds like fun!!!  Joey
Thanks Joey! Going to go back again next year for sure!
You all looked like you were having a great time......cute kids!!
Great report and pics Tinman Fishing with family and friends and getting into a few.... doesn't get any better than that Thanks for sharing your trip with us!!! Leechman
Looks like a great family get away. Nice of the American to take you out. He probably taught you a thing or two. They really know their bass fishing!

All they fished with all week was Ray with a white Senko and white crank bait and Dave used a white spinner with a white mister twister on it. They were hitting pike, walleye and bass, same 300 yards all week. I go out with them and i get nothing> lol had better luck off the dock!
Great report, looks like a perfect family holliday!
As long as he realises that it isn't just for breakfast anymore!
He was on a liquid diet all week lol
That was the pic that caught my eye. How long did he stand there holding bass and drinking beer?
Stop jumping to conclusions guys. Maybe the fish was brought back to camp to eat and he decided to crack open a beer before they got the camera out.
he actually ended up giving it to the americans guys in the cabin behind him, who ate it for breakfast
